name: Toolerific
description:
Controls:

  • Z = Shoot
  • Space = Jump
  • WASD/Arrows = Move

Tip:

  • You could combine the spike object with the box object to discover a different tool.
  • Your goal is to shoot the appropriate item to reach the end of the level.

Even though the project is pretty rough & unfinished, I still wanted to share what I made.
